mapper.select: select max(group_number) as max_group_num from board
mapper.update: update board set sequence_number=sequence_number+1 where group_number=#{groupNumber} and sequence_number > #{sequenceNumber}
mapper.select: select b.* From (select rownum rnum, a.* From (select * from board order by group_number desc, sequence_number asc) a) b where b.rnum>=#{startRow} and b.rnum<=#{endRow}
mapper.update: update board set read_count=read_count+1 where board_number=#{boardNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from board where board_number=#{boardNumber} and password=#{password}
